Blackbird Clan Lord Leona Blackbird:
Are you done preparing? Then let me give you a summary of what I've found out about the Atelia Refinery.
This place was suspicious ever since Atelia Fortress was first built, but there was no way to reach it.
First, I thought this was a base for Embryos to advance to Aden, but it seems it is playing some kind of a role regarding Etis van Etina's power even within Embryos.
